ygData.subject: Missing Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: A lot of good ideas here - and of course someone pointed out the expensive heavy spell components for the new Necro summon corpse. Verant explained they feel
ygData.messageBody:
A lot of good ideas here - and of course someone pointed out the
expensive heavy spell components for the new Necro summon corpse. Verant
explained they feel this is necessary for "balancing" so you can be sure we
won't get it.

The Locate+Mellifluous Motion is a nice idea. Another pipe dream idea I
have (which I doubt we'd ever see - considering how lousy the pathing code
we already have... A song for corpse location in dungeons. Instead of
pointing you in a straight line direction to the corpse - it would show you
the direction to actually get to the corpse...

Slyde
